Episodes.Title: The Matrimonial Momentum
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Penny struggles with Leonard's confession that he kissed another woman as they prepare to get married in Las Vegas. Meanwhile, Sheldon doesn't know what to do after Amy pushes pause on their relationship.

Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Jim Reynolds
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Penny try to work through their marital issues. Meanwhile, Sheldon films a special episode of "Fun with Flags" after his breakup with Amy, and Bernadette feels guilty about withholding a secret from Penny.

Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: The guys's skills are put to the test when they get a flat tire on the way to Mexico for Leonard's bachelor party. The girls throw Penny a mini-bachelorette party.

Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco

Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
